BR_text.BRsummary: Could not upload annotations for the CVAT for video format
BR_text.BRdescription:
<denchmark-h:h3>My actions before raising this issue</denchmark-h>
 
 
  Read/searched the docs
  Searched past issues
 
 <denchmark-h:h3>Expected Behaviour</denchmark-h>
 
 The annotation file is uploaded sucessfully.
 <denchmark-h:h3>Current Behaviour</denchmark-h>
 
 Server exception
 <denchmark-h:h3>Possible Solution</denchmark-h>
 
 <denchmark-h:h3>Steps to Reproduce (for bugs)</denchmark-h>
 
 
 Create multi-job task
 Try to upload annotations.zip
 
 <denchmark-h:h3>Context</denchmark-h>
 
 <denchmark-h:h3>Your Environment</denchmark-h>
 
 
 Git hash commit (git log -1):
 Docker version docker version (e.g. Docker 17.0.05): 19.03.08
 Are you using Docker Swarm or Kubernetes?
 Operating System and version (e.g. Linux, Windows, MacOS): Ubuntu 19
 Code example or link to GitHub repo or gist to reproduce problem:
 Other diagnostic information / logs:
   
 Logs from `cvat` container

     shapes.extend(interpolate(prev_shape, shape))
